experiences: Engineered and implemented a user-friendly contact enrollment feature for non-members, supporting seamless training and event registration through the website.
Executed workflows for enrollment and email notifications.
Built member enrollment functionality, allowing registered members to sign up for events without payment.
Designed and enforced create, read, update, delete operations for contact details, enabling administrators to efficiently manage user records.
Implemented save search functionality, enabling users to store search criteria and generate reusable URLs for quick access.
Applied features to check trip availability and vacancies during the search and booking process for both agents and travelers.
Built workflows to validate seat availability once a trip was selected, ensuring accurate real-time booking.
Worked on commission calculations for agents, including booking fees and refund fee management.
Enforced refund processing for specific tickets, ensuring secure and seamless handling of cancellations.
